Posts.Content: Sep 14, 2010 11:03PM kindone wrote: jlee2511-I will tell you what happen to me, My baseline was always high before chemo 27-29 were 38, 37,36, and after chemo the same.  A year after dx they went up to 39, 43, and 47.  I had to go for ct scan, bone scan and pet scan.  All neg. it took ten years off my life. This all took place all in about 9mos, now they are back down to 35, 36.  Thank the Lord.  My doctor told me that my baseline is just high. So don't get to upset until you know otherwise.  Best of Luck to you and your mom. betty
